burlap.behavior.singleagent.options

Class SubgoalOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.behavior.singleagent.options.SubgoalOption
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Option, Action

    public class SubgoalOption
extends Object
implements Option
    A class for a classic subgoal Markov option. The option policy is specified with a Policy object, the deterministic termination conditions with a StateConditionTest and the initiation set with a StateConditionTest.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface burlap.behavior.singleagent.options.Option

        Option.Helper

      Fields

      The states in which the option terminates deterministically

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the option
        p - the option's policy
        init - the initiation states of the option
        terminationStates - the deterministic termination states of the option.
